vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.21;
son of: Ephraim (H0669);
brother of: Shuthelah (H7803), Becher (H1071H), Tahan (H8465), Ezer (H5827) and Beriah (H1283H)
§ Elead = "God has testified"
a descendant of Ephraim
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以列 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "神已見證"
一位以法蓮的後裔 (代上 7:21)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以列 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "神已见证"
一位以法莲的后裔 (代上 7:21)
